Articles.Content:
I've seen thread where the first few post were marked reserved by the poster for later updates. I'm trying to do the same, but when I'm replying My own thread, it goes in the first post as an update instead of in a new post.

How should I do?

Edited December 25, 2014 by Kesa
It's ok, I went advanced reply and it did the job, sry for the noise

The forum will automatically merge any concurrent posts made via the Quick Reply form into previous posts, if it is posted within a few minutes of the last post. Glad you found a way around it, though.
